description: Detects KrbRelayUp used to perform a universal no-fix local privilege escalation in windows domain environments where LDAP signing is not enforced
name: KrbRelayUp Hack Tool
query: (process.executable:*\\KrbRelayUp.exe OR OriginalFilename:"KrbRelayUp.exe" OR (process.command_line:*\ relay\ * AND process.command_line:*\ \-Domain\ * AND process.command_line:*\ \-ComputerName\ *) OR (process.command_line:*\ krbscm\ * AND process.command_line:*\ \-sc\ *) OR (process.command_line:*\ spawn\ * AND process.command_line:*\ \-d\ * AND process.command_line:*\ \-cn\ * AND process.command_line:*\ \-cp\ *))
author: Florian Roth
